Exact relations connect the threshold parameters with the spatial probability distribution of the bound state
title: A Variation on compositeness (including Higher Partial Waves).pdf
abstract: The “spatial interpretation of compositeness”, presented and discussed in [1, 2] in the context of non-relativistic potential scattering, is extended to higher partial waves. A particular set of basis states is used to arrive at a slightly different perspective on the derivation and interpretation of “compositeness” usually given in the literature. 1 arXiv:2502.08413v1 [nucl-th] 12 Feb 2025
